title: Biden directs states to prioritize educators in vaccine rollouts as he aims to reopen schools
content:
1. Biden directs states to prioritize educators in vaccine rollouts as he aims to reopen schools  Fox News
  2. Biden Says U.S. Will Have Vaccine Supply For All Adults By May, Prioritizes Teachers  NPR
  3. Biden Announces Johnson & Johnson And Merck Partnership To 'Accelerate' Covid Vaccine Production  MSNBC
  4. Pressure mounts for Massachusetts to vaccinate educators  The Boston Globe
  5. Biden Predicts Life in the U.S. Will Return to Normal 'By This Time Next Year'  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 拜登指示各州在疫苗推广中优先考虑教育工作者，因为他的目标是重新开放学校。
拜登指示各州在疫苗推廣中優先考慮教育工作者，因爲他的目標是重新開放學校。
